name: FREE NOW - SneakOUT!
description:
Hello! Everyone!! Thank you a lottttttttt for visiting "Sneak OUT!" Game page! <About me and game!>

I am from South Korea, currently studying computer science in university.

I really enjoy playing games, doesn't matter what kinds of genre it is. 

After getting to know about Unity, I wasn't able to wait to create my first game!

So, here you are! My first game named Sneak OUT!

This is a simple 3D game, moving a ball, going through some hardships, escape the house!

I wouldn't say it is easy! My time attack was about an hour... (may be I am not talented)

There is the cute yellow ball named "Joy" in the game.

well, he doesn't look that happy right?

Please help him to get out of this big house as fast as you can!

<This is "How to play".>

you can also "double jump" with space bar!

<This is a short trailer of Sneak OUT on Youtube.> <Lastly...>

It is my first time using itch.io, and uploading my game online. Hope you can be generous about the game price! (Not expecting much money, but I needed some motivation for next game!)please help!, i need to pay my friend for drawing sprites used in the game!

I welcome ALL of the comments about the game, criticism, cheers,  support, I don't mind at all which one!

It is always pleasure for me to have your interests both good/bad. I will keep on updating the game when you guys gives me some feedback!

THANK YOU AGAIN!
